definition: lackey/errand boy/lit. runner before a carriage
horse/CL:匹[pi3]/horse or cavalry piece in Chinese chess/knight in Western chess
surname Ma/abbr. for Malaysia 馬來西亞|马来西亚[Ma3 lai2 xi1 ya4]
front/forward/ahead/first/top (followed by a number)/future/ago/before/BC (e.g. 前293年)/former/formerly
soldier/servant/to finish/to die/finally/at last/pawn in Chinese chess

sentences.english: The other two federal forts, however, became pawns in a game of war or peace.
sentences.chinese: 而其它兩座要塞則成爲戰爭或和平遊戲當中的馬前卒。

sentences.english: So he put aside his dignity, they are willing to Wu to become a pawn.
sentences.chinese: 於是他放下尊嚴，甘願到吳國去當馬前卒。

sentences.english: Father made a general, his son or a pawn.
sentences.chinese: 父親做了將軍，兒子還是馬前卒。

sentences.english: Father has already acted as General , the son has been only a pawn.
sentences.chinese: 父親已做了將軍，兒子還只是馬前卒。

sentences.english: The father is always a captain, while his son is still a soldier.
sentences.chinese: 父親已做了將軍，兒子還只是馬前卒。

sentences.english: His father has done a general, his son was just a pawn.
sentences.chinese: 父親已做了將軍，兒子還只是馬前卒。

sentences.english: The prime minister was a mere tool in the hands of the country's president.
sentences.chinese: 那個總理只不過是該國總統的馬前卒。
